properties.description: PKF Al-Bassam is a Saudi Arabian accounting and management consultancy firm with 292 employees and 36.7% annual growth; founded in 2002, it specializes in audit, assurance, zakat, tax, advisory, internal audit, and risk management services. The company operates primarily in Saudi Arabia and is positioned at global rank #944,001, serving clients with regional expertise and a focus on professional services in accounting and management consulting.

# Welcome to PKF Al Bassam Chartered Accountants

Our firm is one of the leading firms in the area. By combining our
expertise, experience and the energy of our staff, each client receives
close personal and professional attention.Our high standards, service
and specialized staff spell the difference between our outstanding
performance, and other firms. We make sure that every client is served
by the expertise of our whole firm.

**About PKF Al Bassam Chartered Accountants**

Since its’ establishment in 2002, PKF Al Bassam Chartered Accountants has developed a reputation
as one of the most skilled and respected professional services firms in
Saudi Arabia and Bahrain today. Yes we enjoy the privilege of being a young
firm yet our achievements and success are fueled and backed by our heavily
experienced and skilled Executives and members of Staff.

Through a comprehensive suite of auditing and consultancy services, we offer
intelligent solutions to our national, regional and multinational client
base that ranges from individuals and entrepreneurially led owner/ family
managed businesses, to large Groups, Listed Companies and public sector
organizations.

company.about:
Since its' establishment, PKF AlBassam & Co. has developed a reputation as one of the most skilled and respected professional services firms in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

Through a comprehensive suite of auditing and consultancy services, we offer intelligent solutions to our national, regional and multinational client base that ranges from individuals and owner/ family managed businesses, to large groups, listed companies, and public sector organizations.

We also have actuarial capabilities enabling us to provide a wide range of insurance, risk, employee benefits, and data analytics services.
